visualization_prompt: Generate a solid gauge chart showing performance metrics using percentage completion visualization with arc styling
visualization_explanation: The solid gauge visualization presents a single metric (75% completion rate) using a semi-circular design. The dataset contains one quantitative variable (percentage) with ordinal positioning. Synthetic data maintains domain validity through 0-100% range constraints. The chart maximizes data-ink ratio by removing axis lines and labels, following Tufte's principles. Color choice (#1d8348) ensures perceptual salience through luminance contrast (Cairo's effectiveness principle). The centered label (+15% above 60% benchmark) uses D3-style formatting. Pane configuration creates proportional depth perception, while border radius softens the geometric form. Animated transitions enhance user engagement without distorting data integrity.
